column5: Well I just got back from Quebec on saturday and yesterday I decided to head out to a little lake I fish to get a couple of bass... I headed out at about 5 or so and fished untill 8 and since I didn't have the keys to the boat lock I just fished from shore. In the couple of hours out there I had many strikes and pulled in 3 or 4 decent bass maybe a couple pounds and a bunch of one lbers these were all on pink Senko's or fin-s shads I also grabbed a couple on some spinnerbaits and even pulled out a couple pike on the spinnerbait too... I hope to go out a couple more times this week as I need to do some fishing to catch up so expect some picture packed reports of bass, Pike and possibly walleye and also some trout reports if the rivers decide to cooperate... Have a great summer all and good fishing.  Bill
Looking forward to your report Bill. Did you get any fishing done in Quebec?
Bill welcome back brother!! Have I got news for you!! LOL.... we will be cruising them lakes in style now man! LOL   Gerritt.
welcome back and look forward to your report

I did get A day of fishing in quebec.... I got a guide and fished Riviere A Mars in La Baie for salmon with no luck but I did see a couple of em and just being out away from the work was great... Cant wait to get back into some more fish though...
